channel.title: Data Sciene with R
channel.description: Recent content on Data Sciene with R

item.title: About
item.description: My name is Marc Sauter and I am a junior data scientist. How I found my way into data science The first introductory statistics course I had at university was in year 2015 where I was using an installation of the statistical software R version 3.2.2. In the following semester I found myself joining a master’s course on data science that would ultimately change my thinking. This is where I have picked up strategies to sort my files, have formed the habit of doing frequent backups, and have learned to apply statistical learning techniques.
